rules_text:
Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Whenever one or more cards leaves your graveyard, target creature you control connives. If you discard a land card this way, create a food token and a treasure token. [i](To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
